card.name: Outland Tranquility
card.text: Kicker EEE (You may pay an additional EEE as you cast this spell.) You may choose a creature you control if Outland Tranquility was kicked. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures not chosen this way.

card.name: Energy Burst
card.text: You get EE. Then you may pay any amount of {E}. Target creature you control gets +1/+1 for each {E} spent this way and gains hexproof until end of turn

card.text: Teach target creature you control trample. That creature deals damage equal to its power to up to one target creature an opponent controls. (Put a trample counter on it. If it already has trample, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)

card.text: You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner’s hand rather than pay this spell’s mana cost. Veinfire Borderpost enters tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

card.name: Wildfield Borderpost
card.text: You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner’s hand rather than pay this spell’s mana cost. Wildfield Borderpost enters tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

card.name: Do or Die
card.text: Teach target creature you control haste. Until end of turn, you may have that creature assign its combat damage as though it weren’t blocked. Surveil 1. (Put a haste counter on it. If it already has haste, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)

card.name: Lockdown
card.text: Enchant artifact or creature Enchanted permanent can’t attack or block and its activated abilities can’t be activated.

card.name: Energized Emergence
card.text: You get X {E}. Then you may pay any amount of {E}. When you do, teach up to that many target creatures you control trample. (Put a trample counter on it. If it already has trample, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)

card.name: Mana Lens
card.text: When Mana Lens enters, you get EEEE. Lands you control have all basic land types. (Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest.) Pay EE: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Mage-Ring Omenpath
card.text: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.) Engross — Whenever you cast a spell at a time you couldn’t cast a sorcery, you may return Mage-Ring Omenpath to its owner’s hand.

card.name: Springleaf Drum
card.text: {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Smite the Ethereal
card.text: Choose one— • Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. • Destroy target enchantment. • Untap target creature. You gain 4 life.

card.name: Mox Radiant
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. This mana can’t be spent to cast spells.

card.name: Sword of Price and Progress
Artificer's Jitte
card.text: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage, you get EE. Pay EE, choose one— • Create a Gear token. • Create Treasure token. • Create a token that is a copy of an artifact token you control. Equip {2}

card.name: Regression
card.text: The owner of target artifact, battle, or enchantment shuffles it into their library and gains life equal to its mana value.
